channel.title: The Adventures of Burkinab√® Bill
channel.description: Bill's Peace Corps service in Burkina Faso starting in June 2017

item.title: The Road to Burkina Faso
item.description: A few words on why I decided to join the Peace Corps.

item.title: Waiting for Clearances
item.description: With three months to go, I'm still waiting for my clearances to come through. Things are a bit on hold until they do.

item.title: Clearances Received!
item.description: I've gotten both my legal and medical clearance. Barring major incident, I'll be in Ouagadougou on or about June 15!

item.title: Pre-Departure
item.description: I'm all packed and ready to go. I'm scheduled to arrive in the DC area tomorrow afternoon, and I should be in Ouagadougou on Wednesday.

item.title: Arrived in Ouagadougou!
item.description: I made it to Ouagadougu, and everything is going great! I'm too mentally exhausted to write a real post, but I just wanted to get this word out, and let you all know my phone number.
